EmailTemplate.name: 202005_BK_Webinar_Inflight_Internet_Connectivity_MC.On-Demand_Webinar_Inflight_I
EmailTemplate.subject: Now available for on-demand viewing: AeroWave 100 In-flight connectivity webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in our recent webinar “AeroWave 100 In-flight connectivity” on May 28, 2020.
As we mentioned in the presentation AeroWave <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerowave-100]]> provides you and your passengers with proven, in-flight connectivity at an extremely affordable price.
WATCH THE RECORDED EVENT HERE <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/rhvg4jFa9YZFCEVRk9xUWc]]>
If you’re not sure of where to start, contact us <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/contact-us]]>. We’re happy to listen, make recommendations and help you find a dealer/installer to get you connected today.
Thank you and enjoy the recorded webcast!
Sapan Shah and the BendixKing team
